function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respiratory droplet transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Transmission of disease to others","Mitigation":"Proper use of masks and social distancing","Technologies":"Air purification systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities"},{"Description":"Fomite transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Contamination of surfaces and potential infection","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) devices","People":"General population","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the contribution of small respirable particles to close proximity transmission","Impact":"Uncertain risk of airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Further research and monitoring","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems","People":"Research institutions, health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, health authorities"}]}
